text:
Hello there!
I am looking for a special workaround to add products with a specific discount percentage into offers.
That is to say, that a product, which comes from a specific folder in the product library, get's added to the offer with a prefilled discount percentage. Does anyone know, if there is some kind of opporunity to realize this case. As far as I can see the product properties don't offer a field for a "default" percentage, but maybe there is another way around this.
I'd be very happy about some suggestions.

Thank you so much

Andi

Hi guys. We're looking for a way to log the IP Address of a user when a marketing subscription is confirmed via an opt in email. As in: User subscribes to a marketing email, receives a double opt-in mail, clicks the link to confirm. We need to log which IP has confirmed which recipient email address. Is there any clever way we could do this? I was looking into a way to use the after confirmation landing page but I don't see how I could figure out which email address has been confirmed. Any ideas?
to clarify. the IP Address doesn't have to be logged in HubSpot. as long as we can make the connection between IP and confirmed email address, we'd be happy
When using the language switcher on a HubSpot page - does the language change the text of the header and footer?

hi  <@U018PKU2RFS>, what do you mean by offer, are you talking about adding in quote?

yes there is no default percentage field, but if you can enter the percentage, you might use calculated properties.
Can we add additional font awesome icons in HubSpot?
it is at the bottom of the article

Hi <@UBT0AHWLD>, thanks for your quick reply. I've checked the doc but I am not sure how to add additional font-awesome icons.... Because HubSpot doesn't support all icons and we need to use additional font-awesome icons.
If you're suggesting font awesome kit, I tried that method. Is it possible to switch icons inside modules if we use it?
